channel.title: Help me with a glitch on my 562 pls! Also how to add sprites.(noob ques i know)
channel.description:
Ok so when u train skills or do ::master it just brings ur skill up like half way? or a lil more or less, anyways like when u get 23 att, ull have like 9 att like it says 9/23 and i know u can drink a pot to get it up, but i don't want my players to have to do that. And How do i add sprites to the right spot. Eg:Use my ancient curse sprites
Can someone help me? :(
